functions.tag: {Unbreakable:1b,HideFlags:63,RPG:{PhysicDefense:110,ItemType:"Armor",GoldCost:1500},display:{Lore:['{"text":"Forged in hell, by an adventurer","color":"gray","italic":false}','{"text":"that never came back from there.","color":"gray","italic":false}','{"text":"The set was floating on lava, and","color":"gray","italic":false}','{"text":"bugs were  smoldering when","color":"gray","italic":false}','{"text":"touching it for half a second.","color":"gray","italic":false}','{"text":" "}','{"text":"Defense: 110","color":"dark_red","italic":false}','{"text":" "}','{"text":"Armor","color":"#4f0300","bold":true,"italic":false}'],Name:'{"text":"Hellfire Pyrochaos Leggings","color":"#4f0300","italic":false}'}}
